root.name: Gretzky NHL
root.description: Gretzky NHL was a launch title for the PSP (PlayStation Portable) in March of 2005. It was developed by Page 44 Studios in San Francisco, and for the most part met with mediocre reviews. A follow up on the PSP, Gretzky NHL '06 was released only 5 months later in August.In Canada it was for many disappointingly added to the PSP Bundle at launch, which in turn also forced consumers to pay an extra $50 for their PSP, with no other purchase option.
